pr_title: Add support for client binding API

timeline.message: Add support for client binding API. Closes #3992

timeline.bodyText: context.getParameters() should not be called repeatedly. It is an expensive operation from a performance perspective.
timeline.author: graemerocher

timeline.bodyText: context.getParameterValueMap() should not be called repeatedly. It is an expensive operation from a performance perspective
timeline.author: graemerocher

timeline.bodyText: We shouldn't be introducing new behaviour that adds warnings
timeline.author: graemerocher

replies.bodyText: Should this be deprecated then in 2.1? https://github.com/micronaut-projects/micronaut-core/blob/2.0.x/http/src/main/java/io/micronaut/http/bind/binders/TypedRequestArgumentBinder.java#L40
replies.author: jameskleeh

timeline.bodyText: Why use Argument.of if you are just going to call typeHashCode(). Isn't it the same as doing HttpHeaders.class.hashCode()?
timeline.author: graemerocher

replies.bodyText: Seems it is just calling Objects.hash(String.class) which is transforming String.class into Object[] { String.class } and producing a different hash. Still not sure what the point is.
replies.author: graemerocher

timeline.bodyText: Since there will be many add @Indexed(ClientArgumentRequestBinder.class)
timeline.author: graemerocher

@@ -0,0 +1,43 @@
+/*
+ * Copyright 2017-2020 original authors
+ *
+ * Licensed under the Apache License, Version 2.0 (the "License");
+ * you may not use this file except in compliance with the License.
+ * You may obtain a copy of the License at
+ *
+ * https://www.apache.org/licenses/LICENSE-2.0
+ *
+ * Unless required by applicable law or agreed to in writing, software
+ * distributed under the License is distributed on an "AS IS" BASIS,
+ * WITHOUT WARRANTIES OR CONDITIONS OF ANY KIND, either express or implied.
+ * See the License for the specific language governing permissions and
+ * limitations under the License.
+ */
+package io.micronaut.http.client.bind;
+
+import io.micronaut.core.annotation.Experimental;
+import io.micronaut.core.convert.ArgumentConversionContext;
+import io.micronaut.http.MutableHttpRequest;
+
+/**
+ * A binder that binds to a {@link MutableHttpRequest}. Argument binders
+ * are not able to modify the URI of the request.
+ *
+ * @param <T> A type
+ * @author James Kleeh
+ * @since 2.1.0
+ */
+@Experimental
+public interface ClientArgumentRequestBinder<T> {
+
+    /**
+     * Bind the given argument to the request. Argument binders
+     * are not able to modify the URI of the request.
+     *
+     * @param context The {@link ArgumentConversionContext}
+     * @param value   The argument value
+     * @param request The request
+     */
+    void bind(ArgumentConversionContext<T> context, T value, MutableHttpRequest<?> request);

timeline.bodyText: This is an internal class, make protected
timeline.author: graemerocher
graemerocher

@@ -0,0 +1,41 @@
+/*

+ *
+ * Licensed under the Apache License, Version 2.0 (the "License");

+ * limitations under the License.

+package io.micronaut.http.client.bind;
+
+import io.micronaut.core.annotation.Experimental;
+import io.micronaut.core.type.Argument;
+
+import java.util.Optional;
+
+/**
+ * A registry of {@link ClientArgumentRequestBinder} instances.
+ *
+ * @author James Kleeh
+ * @since 2.1.0
+ */
+@Experimental
+public interface HttpClientBinderRegistry {
+
+    /**
+     * Locate an {@link ClientArgumentRequestBinder} for the given argument.
+     *
+     * @param argument The argument
+     * @param <T>      The argument type
+     * @return An {@link Optional} of {@link ClientArgumentRequestBinder}
+     */
+    <T> Optional<ClientArgumentRequestBinder<T>> findArgumentBinder(Argument<T> argument);

+package io.micronaut.http.client.bind;
+
+import edu.umd.cs.findbugs.annotations.NonNull;
+import io.micronaut.core.annotation.Experimental;
+import io.micronaut.core.type.Argument;
+
+import java.util.Collections;
+import java.util.List;
+
+/**
+ * A {@link ClientArgumentRequestBinder} that is resolved based on the argument type.
+ *
+ * @param <T> The argument type
+ * @author James Kleeh
+ * @since 2.1.0
+ */
+@Experimental
+public interface TypedClientArgumentRequestBinder<T> extends ClientArgumentRequestBinder<T> {
+
+    /**
+     * @return The argument type.
+     */
+    Argument<T> argumentType();
